summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of the alley in block 59, A.A. Denny's Addition, being the alley between 6th Avenue and 7th Avenue, from Pike Street to Pine Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Majority Petition No. 93402 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
